channel.title: Some help and questions
channel.description: Hey, First of all I am a noob to clients and just started rsps after 4 years so I have forgotten everything. When I say everything I mean everything! Some questions: There is a tut on how to do vote4cash on pi but i dont understand what a webhost is and how to make a new vote.php file? Any help guys? Secoundly My client allways takes a long time loading at unpacking media (80%) Any help? Finnaly How do i change the color of the top bar and add new options on the client? This is pi :) Thanks for any help guys-- Even if you only know 1 answer than please reply :)

item.title: Some help and questions
item.dc:creator: @darrenshan darrenshan
item.description:
@darrenshan wrote:

Hey,
First of all I am a noob to clients and just started rsps after 4 years so I have forgotten everything. When I say everything I mean everything!
Some questions:
There is a tut on how to do vote4cash on pi but i dont understand what a webhost is and how to make a new vote.php file? Any help guys?
Secoundly My client allways takes a long time loading at unpacking media (80%) Any help?
Finnaly How do i change the color of the top bar and add new options on the client? This is pi
Thanks for any help guys-- Even if you only know 1 answer than please reply

Read full topic
